meta.title: Rutuja Kolate | Software Engineer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing product design work and skills

about.bio: Aspiring full-stack developer passionate about user-centered design, accessibility, and ethical tech. Experienced in building real-world web apps using Java, Spring Boot, and ReactJS through internships and freelance projects.
focus: Building full-stack web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and ReactJS
Designing user-friendly interfaces with a focus on accessibility and performance
Collaborating on real-world projects and continuously learning new technologies

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: Worked on front-end development using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Focused on creating interactive and responsive web applications while mastering core JavaScript concepts like DOM manipulation and OOP.
achievements: Developed interactive UI components improving user experience across devices
Strengthened knowledge of core JavaScript and responsive design
Contributed to multiple projects during internship enhancing real-world coding skills

experience.title: Artificial Intelligence Intern
experience.description: Completed a 4-week virtual internship focused on Artificial Intelligence. Gained hands-on exposure to AI fundamentals and real-world applications while solving assigned project tasks.
achievements: Completed AI-based project tasks as per weekly deadlines
Developed understanding of real-world AI workflows
Demonstrated responsibility, task ownership, and learning agility

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: Completed a virtual internship in Web Development, gaining practical experience and professional skills through active project participation and client-side development.
achievements: Contributed actively to client-side web projects
Received recognition for strong work ethic and positive impact
